title: Csi Leasing Canada

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $858.3K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Csi Leasing Canada. The average
  contract duration was 2.34 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $277.8K. The longest
  contract was 4.71 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.0M.
lookup_name: 'CSI LEASING CANADA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '858.3K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '15'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '10'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '67%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '9%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '330.3K'
s424_mean_duration: '2.34'
s421_mean_contract_value: '277.8K'
s425_max_duration: '4.71'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.0M'
